title: Front Fork - Inspection

body.body: Inspect the fork inner tube for stone chips, scoring, scratches, excessive wear and any other damage. Renew as necessary.
Small inclusions in the inner tube may be removed using a fine grade stone or similar.
Inspect the spring for damage, cracks and deformation. Renew the spring if necessary.
Inspect all the bushes and seals for damage. Renew any damaged items if necessary.
